title: rona64
author: rona64
content: Hello everyone, I came to this forum seeking funding for a new business I am creating. I know a bot developer that is creating a very effective crypto gambling bot that people can use to deposit. They will be able to play various games like blackjack, towers, mines and can coinflip against other players. I have already invested around $1.5k of my own money into this, I have a few graphics being commissioned and I paid the bot developer to do some more work on the bot. I am seeking more funding for marketing and to continue this and to get a lot more people interested. A few months ago me and the bot developer ran a test with his bot that only had blackjack, we spent around $1k on ads through Discord dm advertisements and we were able to get around $30k in deposits and $10k in withdrawals profiting around $20k total. We closed it, split the money and went our separate ways. I can show proof of this, happy to explain further about anything but please add me on Telegram if you are interested.https://t.me/ronal64

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: rona64 on October 30, 2022, 04:50:31 AM...A few months ago me and the bot developer ran a test with his bot that only had blackjack, we spent around $1k on ads through Discord dm advertisements and we were able to get around $30k in deposits and $10k in withdrawals profiting around $20k total. We closed it, split the money and went our separate ways. I can show proof of this, happy to explain further about anything but please add me on Telegram if you are interested.You're just wasting time hoping that someone will give their money to a person they don't know and who can disappear with the money at any moment. You still have the opportunity to finance your project by returning back the 20 thousand that you have already shared with the developer.
